titles.title: United States Federal Government Preservation Act of 1999
To prohibit the use of funds to administer or enforce the provisions of Executive Order 13107, relating to the implementation of certain human rights treaties.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. United States Federal Government Preservation Act of 1999 - Prohibits the use of appropriated funds to administer or enforce the provisions of Executive Order 13107 relating to the implementation of certain human rights treaties.
